name: Town Story - Match 3 Puzzle
description:
A mansion decorating game hits on sugary candy Town Story! 😜
Congratulations! You just got the most popular mansion decorating game!
Welcome to wonderful Town Story - one of the best candy match 3 games is built for mansion decorating game lovers to start a garden design adventure.

😉 Join the best mansion decorating game to become the king of sweet garden design world!

💕 What’s the difference from other match 3 games? 💕
- Hundreds of 🍬 tasty candy 🍬 filled puzzles with more added frequently
- Be cautious with vines, thorns and chocolates that could appear in your garden design  🎨🎨🎨
- Amazingly creative 🍭 sweet candy 🍭 with mansion decorating game differs from conventional match 3 games
- Play and contest with friends in Facebook
- 🎵 super addicting puzzles you can even play offline 🎵

Download this one of the fantastic match 3 games with garden design for FREE now!!! 👈
Like us on Facebook 👈：https://www.facebook.com/TownStoryCandy/


Embark on an adventurous house journey and help Rita to get hack her memories in this beautiful mansion: passing through hundreds of uniquely well-designed candy match 3 puzzles, 😜 unlock ever more chapters in the gripping garden story of the old mansion house along the way! 😆 What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in one of the best creative candy puzzle games and become the master in sugary candy Town Story! 😍
